title: Apply uploaded logo and background images across the website

requirements.text:
Add the 4 user-uploaded image files to the frontend as static assets under `frontend/public/assets/uploaded/` (or `frontend/public/assets/generated/` if that is the existing convention for site images), preserving the original filenames:
- `Gemini_Generated_Image_8fgrd38fgrd38fgr.png`
- `Gemini_Generated_Image_i78ybxi78ybxi78y.png`
- `Gemini_Generated_Image_8fgrd38fgrd38fgr-1.png`
- `Gemini_Generated_Image_i78ybxi78ybxi78y-1.png`

quotes: add this logo and background in website

acceptanceCriteria: All four uploaded image files exist in the repo under the chosen static assets folder and are accessible via `/assets/...` URLs at runtime.
No backend changes are required to serve these images.

requirements.text: Update the marketing site branding to use the uploaded logo image in the Header and Footer by replacing the current logo image source (`/assets/generated/shankar-gared-logo.dim_512x512.png`) with the uploaded logo file `Gemini_Generated_Image_8fgrd38fgrd38fgr.png` (or `Gemini_Generated_Image_8fgrd38fgrd38fgr-1.png` if the former is not suitable), while keeping existing alt text in English.

quotes: add this logo and background in website

acceptanceCriteria: Header logo renders the uploaded logo image and remains correctly sized/aligned on mobile and desktop.
Footer logo renders the uploaded logo image and remains correctly sized/aligned on mobile and desktop.
No broken image links appear in the Header or Footer.

requirements.text: Apply the uploaded background image `Gemini_Generated_Image_i78ybxi78ybxi78y.png` (or `Gemini_Generated_Image_i78ybxi78ybxi78y-1.png` if the former is not suitable) as the Hero background image by replacing the current Hero image source (`/assets/generated/hero-hardware-agrimachinery.dim_1600x900.png`). Ensure text contrast and readability remain strong by keeping or adjusting the existing overlay/gradient as needed.

quotes: add this logo and background in website

acceptanceCriteria: The Hero section uses the uploaded background image and it covers the section without distortion (object-cover behavior).
Hero headline, description, and CTA buttons remain readable on top of the new background (sufficient overlay/gradient remains).
No broken image link appears in the Hero section.

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose them instead).
Do not edit any files listed in `frontend.immutablePaths` in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not change backend canister logic or data schemas.
Do not redesign unrelated pages or modify product/shop/cart functionality beyond applying the requested logo/background assets.
